Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic provides chiropractic treatment for neck pain, and we’ve enjoyed exceedingly high success rate. Moreover, our services are affordable.

Our clinic was set up in 1998 by pioneering Singaporean chiropractor Dr David Liew after he graduated with a Doctorate of Chiropractic degree from a top health sciences university in the US.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.5″ max_width=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_testimonial author=”J C Lin” portrait_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Clinic-Testimonial-J-C-Lin.jpg” quote_icon=”off” portrait_width=”110″ portrait_height=”110″ admin_label=”Testimonial – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ body_font_size=”18″ use_background_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#424242″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212121″ background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”6%|6%|6%|6%|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” border_width_all_portrait=”3px” border_color_all_portrait=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″]

I had chronic neck pain for many years. Because of it, I spent a lot of money on pillows, thinking they could ease the pain.

After just a few sessions with Dr Salman, my pain was completely gone! And he did not even introduce me to any medication. My life became so much better!

I highly recommend Dr Salman!

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”20px||16px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-9px||-4px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-8px||-2px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Opening – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_font_size=”34px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_4_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font_size=”34px” header_4_letter_spacing=”-1px” hover_enabled=”0″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”32px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_3_font_size_phone=”26px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_4_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_4_font_size_phone=”26px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_5_font_size_tablet=”” header_5_font_size_phone=”” header_5_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” ol_position=”outside”]

Neck pain is a common problem, and most people will experience at least one episode of neck pain in their life.

In some instances, it comes on suddenly and disappears quickly. In other cases, neck pain can be persistent and incapacitating, with some people suffering repeated episodes.

Neck pain symptoms can lead to other problems such as headaches, shoulder pain, and insomnia.

Neck ailment can be caused by sports injuries or other traumatic damage or it may start gradually, possibly through poor posture or an uncomfortable work position. It can range from annoying to excruciating. In chronic cases, everyday activities can become unmanageable.

Neck pain and stiffness often result from injuries to or misalignment of the vertebrae in the neck. Unless treated, the condition can result in a slipped disc or cause nerve compression or spinal degeneration. This progression may lead to more pain and less functionality.

Types of neck pain

Your neck is home to seven vertebrae, with discs between them, blood vessels, lymph nodes, the thyroid gland, various muscles, the larynx, and the trachea. Conditions affecting any of these cervical components can cause neck pain.

There’re 4 main types of neck pain:

  1. Axial neck pain – when the muscles and ligaments fail to function properly together.
  2. Whiplash-associated disorder – with symptoms similar to axial neck pain.
  3. Cervical radiculopathy – caused by pressure on a cervical nerve root.
  4. Cervical myelopathy – compression of the spinal cord.

Don’t endure the pain any longer.

Typical neck pain causes

Common causes of neck pain are:

  • Degenerative disc disease.
  • Neck strain.
  • Whiplash injury caused by a severe jerk to the head, typically in a car accident.
  • Herniated disc.
  • Pinched nerve.
  • Throat infection.
  • Lymph gland infection.

Neck pain symptoms

Neck pain generally takes the form of a dull ache, which can get worse with movement such as turning your head.

Other neck pain symptoms include:

  • Tenderness
  • Numbness
  • Tingling
  • Sharp, shooting pain
  • Light-headedness
  • Lymph gland swelling
  • Difficulty swallowing
  • Headache
  • Weakness in the arms

Natural remedies for neck pain relief

Non-drug treatments include:

  • Acupuncture
  • Physiotherapy
  • Massage
  • Heat pads
  • Chiropractic neck adjustment techniques

Chiropractic treatment for neck pain is effective and can cost far less than some other therapies.

Benefits of neck pain chiropractic care

While some neck pain treatments – including massage and pain-killers – only provide short-term relief, chiropractic chronic neck pain treatment gets to the root of the problem.

Neck pain chiropractic care may include several treatment options, depending on your specific case.

For instance, therapy by a whiplash chiropractor may involve cervical chiropractic care, exercises, lifestyle changes, and muscle stimulation. Stiff neck therapy is also often used in chiropractic to free locked-up areas and restore motion.

After a thorough consultation and examination, Dr David Liew will determine the best form of chiropractic neck adjustment for your neck pain management.

Neck alignment chiropractic adjustment techniques include:

  • Cervical spine manipulation – this cervical chiropractic adjustment technique entails a high-velocity, low-amplitude thrust of the hand.
  • Activator method – this chiropractic neck adjustment benefits patients by using a small hand-held activator adjusting instrument to deliver a gentle impulse to the cervical spine to restore motion to a vertebra or joint.
  • Shockwave therapy – a hand-held probe transmits high-intensity sound waves to encourage the body to heal itself.

Why our patients choose us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#7CB342″ divider_weight=”4″ admin_label=”Divider – Clinic” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”80px” module_alignment=”center” height=”40px” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”bottom” global_module=”106″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Clinic – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-16px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic in Singapore is highly experienced in providing affordable chiropractic care for neck pain. Dr David Liew has successfully treated countless patients who have suffered neck trauma or developed medical conditions that affect the neck, helping them to get their lives back on track by alleviating pain and restoring function.

Dr David Liew does his own chiropractic research into neck problems and other painful conditions in the rest of the body. He continually hones his expertise by monitoring advances in chiropractic treatments.

excerpt.rendered: Neck Pain TreatmentThe scores of testimonials we’ve received is proof Dr David Liew‘s chiropractic treatment is effective. Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic provides chiropractic treatment for neck pain, and we’ve enjoyed exceedingly high success rate. Moreover, our services are affordable. Our clinic was set up in 1998 by pioneering Singaporean chiropractor Dr David Liew after he graduated with a Doctorate of Chiropractic degree […]
